short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Let AccessB2B DX take the time and guesswork of prospecting out of your schedule.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Let AccessB2B DX take the time and guesswork of prospecting out of your schedule! This extension for Chrome enhances your LinkedIn browsing with the power of the DX platform, helping you easily find and manage B2B contact records for the connections you want to make. You can also use the extension when visiting any company website, to get valuable firmographic summaries and insights.
